data.description: The number of top layers in the print. When calculated by the top thickness, this value is rounded to a whole number.
data.img_description: This image shows all parts affected by the top layers setting.
data.hints:
- Instead of setting a height in millimeters for the top layers, you can set a specific number of layers. The resulting height in millimeter will be calculated automatically depending on the layer height set.
- Example: Number of top layers 12 * 0.1mm layer height = 1.2mm top layer thickness.
